thread.title: Ed Sheeran wants to move to New Zealand after falling in love with the country - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran wants to move to New Zealand after falling in love with the country - Mirror Online

author: Natalie Evans
title: Ed Sheeran wants to move to New Zealand after falling in love with the country - Mirror Online
text:
Ed Sheeran wants to move to New Zealand after falling in love with the country The singer has even enquired about citizenship after visiting the country during his year-long break from music Share Ed Sheeran can see himself moving to New Zealand (Photo: WENN.com) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ed Sheeran wants to move to New Zealand after falling in love with the country, he has revealed. 
The singer - who hails from Framlingham, Suffolk, England - visited during his year-long break from the music industry and enquired about citizenship whilst he was out there. 
The 'Castle on the Hill' hitmaker said: "I did ask for citizenship and I think we got an email from someone involved with that. So maybe that’s going to happen. I could be a citizen." 
And the 26-year-old singer believes taking residency in the country will make him safer if there was a world war as "no-one is going to be bothered to come that far to invade". Read More Ed Sheeran bought his parents a gym and swimming pool so they live a long and healthy life The singer fell in love with New Zealand after visiting during his break from music (Photo: Getty Images) 
He added to the Daily Star newspaper: "I’ve always said that if a world war breaks out, the one place I would go to is New Zealand because no-one is going to be bothered to come that far to invade. They’ll be like, 'Ah, we’ll leave them be.'" 
And if Ed does relocate, it is likely his girlfriend Cherry Seaborn would go with him as he recently admitted he feels "pretty good" about the possibility of marrying his childhood sweetheart . 
Asked if his relationship with Cherry has the potential to be a "marriage thing", Ed said: "I'm pretty ... yeah I feel pretty good about it ... Yeah, potentially. I would like some kids." Read More Ed with girlfriend Cherry Seaborn (Photo: Splash) 
Ed feels the "happiest he's been" and has revealed the pair have got pet cats together. 
He shared: "I'm actually the happiest I've been and it's because I had a year to spend with someone. I've always started relationships then gone off on tour. 
"I spent every day for a year with this certain person, we kind of have a strong relationship now which is good. I'm really secure now, we live together and we have cats, and I think when you have cats that's kind of it." Like us on Facebook
